data.title: Richard C. Mangam
data.meta_description: Richard Christopher Mangam was a Private in the United States Army and a Medal of Honor recipient for his role in the American Civil War.
data.text: Richard Christopher Mangam (December 21, 1841 â€“ November 18, 1893) was a Private in the United States Army and a Medal of Honor recipient for his role in the American Civil War.
